category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Cfg0DefaultLoadCountIncreaseRate
preference.preference_description: Defines the increase in the number of search results displayed in one page compared to the one in the previous page. The number of values for the first page is controlled by the "Cfg0DefaultLoadCount" preference. The value indicates a percentage: * less than 100: less results are displayed (in the given percentage) * 100: the number of displayed results is the same * more than 100: more results are displayed (in the given percentage).
